ygData.subject: Matrix gambit
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadowcaster couldn t wait any longer for Rodimus to fill him in. He raced out ofr the base, transformed into his supersonic air attack mode and raced as fast

Shadowcaster couldn't wait any longer for Rodimus to
fill him in. He raced out ofr the base, transformed
into his supersonic air attack mode and raced as fast
as he could to the Ark.  Within 3 hours he'd arrived
at the volcano which would later be called Mount St
Hillary. Activating his retrothrusters, he began a
slow decent, disturbing the local shrubland and trees,
causing them to twist and bend as though they were in
a gail. About 2 metres above the ground, he
transfomred to robot mode, landing with a thud.

'Let's hope the command codes I programmed in at the
base level of Teletran 1's programming haven't been
discovered or altered.' he thought to himself.

With that he activated his comm unit, and, opening a
secure coded channel with sextuple encryption,
transmitted the master override codes into Teletran 1.
 With that, the supercomputer awakened and openned its
doors, awaiting instructions from its creator. 
However, Shadowcaster wasn't interested right at thaty
moment with shoring up The Ark's defences, even though
he knew damn well that this place was the Chaos
Bringer's prime target.

Walking upto Optimus's stasis filled body, he
proceeded to open up his chest, more specifically, the
matrix chamber.

"Sorry Orion, but this is the only way." with that, he
activated a life support sequence for Optimus ' body
while the matrix was missing from it, before openning
his own chest up to reveal his own matrix chamber,
where he placed it. He'd forgotten the unbelievable
feeling of power he had when he'd carried the matrix;
the sense of power which at the same time is tempered
by incredible wisdom- Shadimus Prime had been reborn!

Transmitting a code to Teletran 1 raising its defences
to Condition Red, Shadimus then sits down and
concentrates, knowing that unless he can commune with
Primus, all transformers in existence, along with the
future that would be, are doomed.......
